body_html:
@t-vi That PR is merged. Go for the changes if you want to!

Another thing we should do for SN is #7865 . Currently we assume that weight.dim(0) is the output feature dimension. However, this is not true for the ConvTranspose cases (should be dim(1))! This is crucial as ConvTs are commonly used in GANs. Fortunately with SN we are given the modules and should be able to detect this case. I'd be more than happy to review if you also want to fix this. Ideally we should also have a dim= argument. :)

body:
@t-vi That PR is merged. Go for the changes if you want to! 

Another thing we should do for SN is #7865 . Currently we assume that weight.dim(0) is the output feature dimension. However, this is not true for the ConvTranspose cases (should be dim(1))! This is crucial as ConvTs are commonly used in GANs. Fortunately with SN we are given the modules and should be able to detect this case. I'd be more than happy to review if you also want to fix this. Ideally we should also have a `dim=` argument. :)
